remarks: The value of ` G ` (see ~ frec2uz0d ) at a successor.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 16-May-2020.)
statement:
frec2uz.1 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ZZ ) $.
frec2uz.2 $e |- G = frec ( ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , C ) $.
frec2uzzd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. _om ) $.
frec2uzsucd $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` suc A ) = ( ( G ` A ) + 1 ) ) $.
$d C x $.
